page.title: 10CANFORD MAGNA CREMATORIUM.
page.content: A new crematorium has just been built in Canford Magna.It has cost Poole council just under Â£1million and was completed on 23rd Sept.l985.It will serve a very wide catchment area,inc. Bournemouth,Poole,Wimborne,Wareham,Rin gwood,Verwood etc.The l4acre site is at the corner of Gravel Hill & Arrow- smith Rd. & a new roundabout facilit- ates entry.Designed by council archit- ect Mr.Warmington,it is a striking building of good modern design (see slide).The brickwork is of Swanage brick & the clay tiles are handmade. The building contractors are W.E. Chivers.The crematorium will be opened in Oct.l985 & there will be a service of dedication,conducted by the Bishop of Sherborne,th Right Rev.John Kirkham on Nov 28th, l985.
